name: Junkfood
summary: Junk Food is a Boom compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Community Discord Server. The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter ala BFG spammy, high monster count maps where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design/other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.
